rules.natural: If the organization has a partnership with a local community, then a senior division volunteer program must be present.

rules.prover9_expression: (has_volunteer_program(organization, youth_division) -> (-(conducts_activity(organization, tree_planting) -> achieves_goal(organization, habitat_protection)) -> receives_funding(organization, corporate_sponsorship)))
rules.natural: Under the condition that the organization has a youth division volunteer program, if tree planting activity does not imply habitat protection achievement, then corporate sponsorship funding is obtained.
Provided that a senior division volunteer program exists, a youth division volunteer program must also be maintained.
When the organization operates in a national park, either a fundraising auction game is hosted, or lacking habitat protection achievement implies electric van usage.
Either tree planting activity or river cleanup activity is conducted by the organization.
Provided that river cleanup activity is conducted, habitat protection goal is achieved.
Whenever corporate sponsorship funding is received, government grant funding is also received.

rules.prover9_expression: (has_partnership(organization, university) -> (-(conducts_activity(organization, tree_planting) -> achieves_goal(organization, habitat_protection)) -> receives_funding(organization, corporate_sponsorship)))
rules.natural: If a partnership exists with a university, then when tree planting does not ensure habitat protection, corporate sponsorship funding must be received.
Either the organization has a partnership with a university or with a local community.
If conducting tree planting does not lead to achieving habitat protection, then government grant funding is not received.
Provided that the organization does not operate in a national park, conflict with a logging company exists.
If habitat protection is not achieved, then it is not the case that an electric van is used.

facts.natural: It is not the case that the organization hosts a fundraising auction game.
The organization does not have conflict with a logging company.

target.natural: The organization achieves habitat protection goal.

Provided that the organization has a partnership with a local community, if it is not true that conducting tree planting leads to achieving habitat protection, then corporate sponsorship funding is received.
Under the condition that tree planting does not result in habitat protection, corporate sponsorship funding is obtained.
Should tree planting activity fail to guarantee habitat protection achievement, government grant funding is received.
If tree planting activity is conducted, then habitat protection goal is achieved.
The organization achieves habitat protection goal.
